Question
========

Of 100 individuals, systolic blood pressure (SB) was measured and classified into three classes: 1 = low, 2 = medium and 3 = high. Also, the physical activity behavior (AG) was measured and classified into three classes classified: 1 = rarely, 2 = sometimes, 3 = regularly. The results are shown in cross tabulation below:

  ------------- -------- -------- -------- frequencies SB = 1 SB = 2 SB = 3 AG = 1 4 12 14 AG = 2 13 25 12 AG = 3 8 8 4 ------------- -------- -------- --------

On what scale is the variable AG represented?

Answerlist
----------

* Nominal
* Ordinal
* Interval
* Ratio

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Nominal: Incorrect
* Ordinal: Correct
* Interval: Incorrect
* Ratio: Incorrect
